name: Minecraft Vanilla
description: Vanilla Minecraft server powered by itzg/minecraft-server.

agreement.title: Minecraft EULA
agreement.text: You must accept the Minecraft End User License Agreement before creating this server.

composeInline:
services:
  minecraft:
    image: itzg/minecraft-server:latest
    container_name: vestri-{{SERVER_SLUG}}
    ports:
      - "25565:25565"
    environment:
      EULA: "TRUE"
      TYPE: "{{SERVER_SOFTWARE}}"
      VERSION: "{{GAME_VERSION}}"
      SERVER_NAME: "{{SERVER_NAME}}"
      MAX_PLAYERS: "20"
    volumes:
      - ./data:/data
    restart: unless-stopped
